name: Transfer new Facebook Lead Ads instant form submissions to KlickTipp
description:
This scenario listens for new submissions from a Facebook Lead Ads Instant Form and automatically adds each lead as a new contact in KlickTipp—without any manual work.

Ideal for coaches, consultants, digital product creators, and marketers who use Facebook or Instagram ads to promote lead magnets, webinars, or free consultations. With this automation, you ensure that every captured lead immediately enters your email marketing workflow.

You can map dynamic fields such as First Name, Selected Product Name, or Offer Type directly from your form—enabling highly personalized welcome sequences, automated follow-ups, or booking reminders in KlickTipp.

This integration helps you grow your list on autopilot, respond instantly to leads, and maximize conversions from your ad campaigns.
